WorkItem.Description:
This issue was in 2.1.7 as well for me.
Basically, anytime I add any additional Optimization conditions, mainly Hit and expertise, optimizer will not find the said results, start optimizing with a value of -(some number) and stay that way the entire optimization. When it finishes and I agree to replace my gear anyway, I see that my gear has been replaced with pretty much junk, and things are removed. No head enchants, no chest enchants, lesser weapon enchants, no leg enchants, rings and trinkets left blank, etc.
 
Both the requirements for my Bear already exist before I even optimize ( Hit > 90 and Expertise > 90) and my soft cap of 160k I can all easily reach with my current tanking set, but rawr refuses to optimize it correctly with one or both of those conditions.
 
I've attached my char xml below
WorkItem.Summary: [Bear] Optimizer Fails to Optimize correctly with additional conditions

Comments.Message:
Found the bug here. Several of the optimizable values for Bear are broken: Hit Rating, Expertise Rating, Haste Rating, Missed Attacks, Unlimited Threat, and Unlimited Threat.

I'll get those fixed.
